snippet.title: City cycling: Road to fitness, or accident waiting to happen?
snippet.description:
* It was just another morning commute. That is, until a bus driver ran a red light, turned right, and drove straight into Ann-Doerthe Hass Jensen. The bus knocked the social worker off her bike, trapping her underneath, a wheel pinning down and crushing her left foot. It was a school bus heading to a Copenhagen kindergarten, and the children aboard w...
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/04/health/city-cycling-road-to-fitness/index.html

snippet.title: Witnesses: Security forces attack protesters and doctors in Bahrain
snippet.description:
* Security forces in Bahrain stormed the main hospital, beating doctors, and attacked demonstrators in Manama's Pearl Roundabout on Wednesday, witnesses in the Bahraini capital said. Bahraini officials deny these accounts.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/WORLD/meast/03/16/bahrain.protests/index.html

snippet.title: Witnesses: King's supporters confront Bahrain students
snippet.description:
* Supporters of the rulers of Bahrain threatened about 5,000 university students protesting against the government at Bahrain University Sunday, eyewitnesses said. The government denied that unjustified force was used.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/WORLD/meast/03/13/bahrain.protests/index.html

snippet.title: 19 Poles killed in bus crash
snippet.description:
* A tourist bus carrying more than four dozen Polish pilgrims crashed early Monday near Lake Balaton in western Hungary, killing 19 people.
http://www.cnn.com/2002/WORLD/europe/07/01/hungary.crash/index.html

snippet.title: Thursday, September 7
snippet.description:
* KABUL (CNN) -- A massive explosion near the U.S. Embassy killed a number people Friday, spreading debris and body parts over a wide area.
http://www.cnn.com/2006/WORLD/europe/09/07/thursday/index.html

snippet.title: Showdown at the H2O Corral
snippet.description:
* There's a popular saying in the American West: Whiskey's for drinking, but water's for fighting over. This dusty little city, made famous by the Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, has a dilly of a water fight on its hands.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/05/10/us/tombstone-water-fight/index.html

snippet.title: Syrian deserters strike military target
snippet.description:
* A fledgling force of Syrian military deserters said it struck an important government security complex on the outskirts of the capital overnight, a bold strike reflecting the resolve and confidence of the regime's opposition.
http://www.cnn.com/2011/11/16/world/meast/syria-unrest/index.html
